name: Mjork Sootling
languages: understands Ignan and Terran but can't speak

traits.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that ends its turn grappling the sootling takes 1 fire damage.

traits.name: Smoke Sense
entries: A sootling in contact with smoke has blindsight in that smoke's area in a radius of up to 120 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the sootling moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Burn
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) fire damage.
